fulltext:
Đoàn Mạnh Hà 
[ 32/4, 12th street , Truong Tho ward, Thu Duc district, HCM city ]  
CURRICULUM 
VITAE 
Objective 
To be an experienced programmer in Java language and to work in an active environment with 
precious opportunities for career promotion.  
To have a chance to develop new software solution and enhance my programming and analytic 
skills. 
To build many softwares that make life easier. 
Experience 
1. Java Developer At TMA Solutions 
HCM city — from 1/7/2011 to 1/5/2013 
I joined TMA company over 1 year. I worked on project that developed the broadband access 
application (GPON technology). The application manages many network devices on web. This 
application is deloyed to Opticom network company in Australia. It has 3 main modules as the 
following: 
1. WEBX (presentation tier implemented in Java): to be responsible for presenting a web page 
on browser.  
2. NXA (business tier implemented in Java) : to be responsible for implementing all business 
logic in system. 
3. INMS : developed by C/C++ code to communicate to network devices. 
Each of modules is deployed to the separate server. 
NXA and INMS talk together through Corba interface. 
NXA and WEBX talk together through EJB interface.  
Duties and Responsibilities: 
● 
Implementing Java code in project. 
● 
Working with other developers to build technical solutions and complete project. 
● 
Fixing the problem occurred in system. 
● 
Developing the new features ,both back-end and front-end if customer require. 
● 
Investigating alternate configurations and implementing better solutions. 
● 
Improving the performance of system.    
2. Senior Java Developer At NashTech (HarveyNash) VN 
HCM city — from 1/6/2013 to 31/08/2015 
* Bodog Project: 
I worked for Bodog project. The project's production link is at https://www.bodog188.com/en. I 
have a chance for working onsite a month in Philippines.  
Description: 
Bodog is one of the world's most successful and well-established digital entertainment and online 
gaming & Casino online. 
Role: 
• 
Developed Back-End service using Java technology. 
Technologies: 
• 
Service is built on REST service, typically use Jersey framework. 
• 
Applied Apache Camel that supports most of the Enterprise Integration Patterns (EIP) in 
order to integrate with other systems. 
• 
Built Bonus system which using Apache Wicket for UI, Spring, JPA & MySQL. 
• 
Applied BDD testing , automation test for user acceptance test, using JBehave framework. 
• 
Applied Mockito library for mock testing (database, services ..., etc). 
Project Management: 
• 
Applied Scrum process. 
• 
Applied Jira product for user stories, bug tracking, time & task monitoring. 
• 
Applied Crucible product for code review. 
• 
Applied Bamboo product for continuous integration. 
* Automation Testing Project: 
Use JSpringBot automation f/w that built on Java & Spring, to develop automation test script. This 
framework support testing on web user interface, API services (RESTful …etc). JSpringBot website 
is at http://jspringbot.org/ 
* Amway Today Project: 
• 
Built an Article Blog CMS website for Amway Organization (production link: 
http://www.amwaytoday.com.au). 
• 
Used AEM/CQ5 Java CMS. 
• 
Technologies: OSGI technology, Adobe AEM/CQ5 , Apache Sling, Apache lucene, Ext-JS, 
JCR.  
• 
Build up Apache HTTPD Server for load balancing, caching. 
• 
Handle Node Event in Apache Sling in order to execute a specific requirement. 
• 
Develop back-end API to return JSON data to font-end. 
• 
Custom search page. 
* Unified Social Project: 
Description: 
Unified is an award-winning marketing cloud technology company. Unified provides professional 
marketers with powerful insights, content and advertising tools built on the industry’s most advanced 
data platform (Unfied website). 
Role: 
• 
Port all old projects written in PHP/Ruby to Java. 
• 
Develope Back-end service using Java technology. 
• 
Develope some features for social tracking as the following: 
o 
Create short link to share on social network 
o 
Click tracking on the short link. 
o 
Conversion tracking on your customer website(page views, goal..etc). 
• 
Write unit test, intergration test. 
Technologies: 
• 
Use Dropwizzard f/w to quickly build Java REST API. 
• 
Applied master-master Mysql deployment model. 
• 
Use RabbitMQ to build an asynchronous system. 
• 
Use Spring Integration AMQP to poll message from RabbitMQ. 
• 
Use Redis as a cache layer. 
• 
Applied Mockito library for mock testing (database, services ..., etc). 
• 
Build tool: Maven, Jenkins CI. 
3. Celeritifintech Services (CFT) VN company 
HCM city — from 01/05/2016 to 15/06/2017 
* Family Dollar Ecommerce Project: 
Description: 
Family Dollar is a neighborhood store, easy to shop. Family Dollar offers every day the best price for 
shoper. Website: http://www.familydollar.com/. 
Role: 
• 
Develop and maintain CMS ecommerce website for Family Dollar. 
• 
Fix font-end bug on website. 
• 
Develope new component. 
• 
Content editor/author. 
Technologies: 
• 
Use CQ5/AEM 6.0 CMS technology to develop website. 
• 
Back-end: JSP, Slighly, Apache Sling, Java Servlet, JCR, Apache Felix, OSGI compliance, 
Ehcache for caching layer. 
• 
Font-end: JQuery, HTML5, CSS3. 
* Financial Technology Mortgage SAAS Project: 
Description: 
The industry's most advanced multichannel lending default management solution, helps keep 
homeowners in their homes while ensuring consistent workouts for borrowers and improved 
compliance for lenders. With 45 percent market penetration including users at the top three 
mortgage lenders, EarlyResolution streamlines the loan workout process for borrowers across all 
channels and helps servicers manage all aspects of loss mitigation. This product provides a service 
as SAAS (Software as a service). 
Role: 
• 
Develop and maintain all features for this project. 
• 
Fix bugs. 
• 
Support production if any issues. 
Technologies: 
• 
Use struts 1.x to develop website. 
• 
Back-end: JSP, JDBC, EJB, JMS. 
• 
Database: IBM Db2 
• 
Font-end: JQuery, HTML5, CSS3. 
• 
Rule Management Control, Workflow engine 
4. Ambient Digital company 
HCM city — from 01/07/2017 to now 
Description: 
Ambient Digital is an independent digital media company providing a range of marketing and media 
solutions across Southeast Asia. We deliver the entire range of digital media products to mobile and 
desktop via our market leading. Website: https://ambientdigitalgroup.com/ 
Role: 
• 
Tech leader for Core back-end service. 
• 
Assist technical director based on client requirement. 
• 
Break down the functionality and assign task to team member. 
• 
Develop new component. 
• 
Coordinate with team member to build the product more reliable, stable and high availability. 
Technologies: 
• 
Back-end: Java, Spring Boot for micro-service, Swagger Open API, RabbitMQ for message 
broker, Redis for caching layer, ElasticSearch for site search, Hibernate/JPA ORM, MySQL 
DB. 
• 
Font-end: JQuery, HTML5, CSS3, Angular 5. 
• 
Use Nginx as load balancing, proxy and API gateway. 
Education 
University of Science, 227 Nguyen Van Cu, district 5, HCM city 
Degree — 2007- 2011                                                                                                                           
I graduated in July 2011 and got a good degree. 
Training  Courses 
Mongo DB For Java Developer 
I joined online Mongo DB course for Java Developer at https://university.mongodb.com/ 
BigData course on coursera 
Skills 
● 
Strong core java development experience. 
● 
Web development: HTML, CSS, Javascript, Angular. 
● 
Java framework: Vaadin, GWT, Struts 1.x, Spring , Spring Boot, Hibernate/JPA, Apache 
Camel. 
● 
Cache technology: Memcache, Redis. 
● 
Java CMS: Adobe CQ5/AEM6, Magnolia. 
● 
RESTful Webservice: Jersey, JAX-RS 
● 
Operating Systems: Window, Linux (Ubuntu). 
● 
Web Server: Jboss, Apache Tomcat, Jetty, Netty. 
● 
Proxy: Nginx, Apache httpd. 
● 
Database: Oracle (PL/SQL), MySQL, Postgres , MS SQL server. 
● 
NoSQL Database: MongoDB. 
● 
Build Tool: Maven, Ant. 
● 
CI: Jenkins, Teamcity. 
● 
Others:  EJB, JMS , Corba , Swing. 
Source Control: SVN, Git. 
Testing: Selenium, Junit, JBehave. 
Environment Tool: Vagrant, Docker 
Design system’s database. 
Research the new technologies. 
Soft skills: Problem solving , communication, team working . 
● 
● 
● 
● 
● 
● 
Languages 
English: Ability to comprehend IT documents, writing & speaking skills. 
Interests 
I'm really interested in out-door activities such as travelling, football. 
I’ve ever joined to conquer the Fanxipan peak in april 2013.
